title: Unexpected Native File Size Increase
body:
### Description

The native libraries are getting larger with each v1.60 release. The build system has been changing, so the added linker settings may have gone missing.

Some related issues #174 and https://github.com/luberda-molinet/FFImageLoading/issues/893

### Basic Information

- Version with issue: v1.60.x
- Last known good version: v1.59.x
